name: Wakatobi Dive Resort

reviews.text: I booked through Ken at Island dreams Scuba Travel out of Houston, Tx and Ken led the trip with 52 divers. We were from all walks of life and diving levels of experience. It was Ken's 11th trip to the Island and he coordinated a fantastic trip. The staff ratio is 3-1 and the service, food, bungaloos and environment were all outstanding. I'm an X- Hotel manager and foodie so had an eye for the unexpected. The Swiss owned and operated team performed magic for 10 days. The Dive team were mostly European and had a macro eye for the unexpected. I rented ALL equipment on site and it performed perfectly. I'd use Island Dreams for my next adventure and certainly reccommend Wakatobi.
reviews.title: Magical Journey

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our first visit to Wakatobi and every thing was great.
reviews.title: Great Dive destination

reviews.text: Food,rooms,dive center and overall organization excellent.
reviews.title: Perfect Scuba diving in a wonderful part of the world

likes.liked: — Remote, and all inclusive. Freedom to do... or not do. And the DIVING
likes.disliked: — If from the US, book nonstop to Singapore, then on to Bali. If possible, spend time on the return in Bali, Singapore or other Asia locale. It's a long way to go, so make the most of it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This resort does a great job even though they are hundreds of miles from from anywhere.
reviews.title: Divers Paradise

description: Wakatobi is inspired by the realization that great people are prepared to travel far to experience the most beautiful reefs left on the planet. It goes further than any other dive resort to be deserving of the most precious time of the year of its guests. Wakatobi is about maximizing value not minimizing cost for its clientele.
